etymologies: Middle English: from Latin anniversarius ‘returning yearly’, from annus ‘year’ + versus ‘turning’

definitions: the date on which an event took place in a previous year

examples.text: the 50th anniversary of the start of World War II

shortDefinitions: date on which event took place or institution was founded in previous year

definitions: the date on which a country or other institution was founded in a previous year
shortDefinitions: date on which country or other institution was founded in previous year

definitions: the date on which a couple was married in a previous year

examples.text: he even forgot our tenth anniversary!

shortDefinitions: date on which couple were married in previous year

definitions: the date on which a romance began in a previous month or week.
shortDefinitions: date on which romance began in previous month or week
